title: Multipier effect on $2 billion drop in Ig

content.question: In an economy the marginal propensity to consume is 0.90, and gross domestic product (GDP) is $100 billion. If gross private domestic investment declines by $2 billion, then GDP will

choices.label: decrease by a maximum of $1.8 billion
decrease by a maximum of $2 billion
decrease by a maximum of $20 billion
increase by a maximum of $1.8 billion
increase by a maximum of $20 billion

content.answer: decrease by a maximum of $20 billion

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
